query.value:
let start=datetime('@{variables('date_start')}');
let end=datetime('@{variables('date_end')}');
let versamenti_assenti = KPI_RENDICONTAZIONI_DETAILS
| where DATA_PAGAMENTO between (start .. end)
| where IS_REND == false
| distinct ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP, PA_TRANSFER
| summarize FLUSSI_ASSENTI=count() by ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP;
let versamenti_presenti = KPI_RENDICONTAZIONI_DETAILS
| where DATA_PAGAMENTO between (start .. end)
| where IS_REND == true
| distinct ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP, PA_TRANSFER
| summarize FLUSSI_PRESENTI=count() by ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP;
let totale_versato = versamenti_presenti // qui copro il KPI #2
| join kind=fullouter versamenti_assenti on ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP
| extend FLUSSI_ASSENTI=case(isempty(FLUSSI_ASSENTI), 0, FLUSSI_ASSENTI)
| extend FLUSSI_PRESENTI=case(isempty(FLUSSI_PRESENTI), 0, FLUSSI_PRESENTI)
| extend ID_BROKER_PSP=case(isempty(ID_BROKER_PSP), ID_BROKER_PSP1, ID_BROKER_PSP)
| extend ID_PSP=case(isempty(ID_PSP), ID_PSP1, ID_PSP)
| extend TOTALE_FLUSSI=FLUSSI_ASSENTI + FLUSSI_PRESENTI
| extend GIORNATA_PAGAMENTO=format_datetime(start, "yyyy-MM-dd")
| project GIORNATA_PAGAMENTO, ID_BROKER_PSP, ID_PSP, TOTALE_FLUSSI, FLUSSI_ASSENTI, FLUSSI_PRESENTI;
let ritardi_flussi_first_version = KPI_RENDICONTAZIONI_DETAILS
| where DATA_PAGAMENTO between (start .. end)
| where IS_REND == true
| where DIFF_DAYS_FIRST_VERSION > 0
| distinct ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP, PA_TRANSFER
| summarize FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION=count() by ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP;
let ritardi_flussi_last_version = KPI_RENDICONTAZIONI_DETAILS
| where DATA_PAGAMENTO between (start .. end)
| where IS_REND == true
| where DIFF_DAYS_LAST_VERSION > 3
| distinct ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP, PA_TRANSFER
| summarize FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION=count() by ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP;
let flussi_in_ritardo = ritardi_flussi_first_version
| join kind=leftouter ritardi_flussi_last_version on ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP
| project ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP, FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION, FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION
| extend FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION=case(isempty(FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION), 0, FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION)
| extend FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION=case(isempty(FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION), 0, FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION);
let _all_flux_stored = FLUSSI_RENDICONTAZIONE
| where INSERTED_TIMESTAMP between (start .. end);
let all_info_flux = FLUSSI_RENDICONTAZIONE
| where INSERTED_TIMESTAMP between (start .. end)
| extend IS_LOADED_FLUX=true
| project ID_FLUSSO, UNIQUE_ID, NUM_PAGAMENTI, SOMMA_VERSATA, IS_LOADED_FLUX, ALL_DATES;
let all_dates_iuv = all_info_flux
| mv-expand ALL_DATES.dates, ALL_DATES
| extend REAL_DATE=case(isempty(ALL_DATES_dates), ALL_DATES, ALL_DATES_dates)
| extend DATE_PAGAMENTO=format_datetime(todatetime(REAL_DATE), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
| distinct DATE_PAGAMENTO
| where DATE_PAGAMENTO != "";
let all_iuv_rendicontati = IUV_RENDICONTATI
| where DATA_ESITO_SINGOLO_PAGAMENTO in (all_dates_iuv)
| summarize PAGAMENTI_RENDICONTATI=count(), IMPORTO_RENDICONTATO=sum(IMPORTO) by ID_FLUSSO, UNIQUE_ID,PSP, INT_PSP;
let info_kpi_error = all_info_flux
| join kind=leftouter all_iuv_rendicontati on ID_FLUSSO, UNIQUE_ID
| project-rename PAGAMENTI_DICHIARATI=NUM_PAGAMENTI, IMPORTO_DICHIARATO=SOMMA_VERSATA
| project ID_FLUSSO, UNIQUE_ID, PAGAMENTI_DICHIARATI, IMPORTO_DICHIARATO, PAGAMENTI_RENDICONTATI, IMPORTO_RENDICONTATO, IS_LOADED_FLUX, PSP, INT_PSP
| extend HAS_DIFF_AMOUNT=case(IMPORTO_DICHIARATO != IMPORTO_RENDICONTATO, true, false)
| extend HAS_DIFF_NUM=case(PAGAMENTI_DICHIARATI != PAGAMENTI_RENDICONTATI, true, false); 
let has_diff_amount = info_kpi_error
| where HAS_DIFF_AMOUNT == true
| summarize TOTALE_DIFF_AMOUNT=count() by INT_PSP, PSP;
let has_diff_num = info_kpi_error
| where HAS_DIFF_NUM == true
| summarize TOTALE_DIFF_NUM=count() by INT_PSP, PSP;
totale_versato
| join kind=leftouter flussi_in_ritardo on ID_PSP, ID_BROKER_PSP
| join kind=leftouter has_diff_amount on $left.ID_PSP == $right.PSP, $left.ID_BROKER_PSP == $right.INT_PSP
| project GIORNATA_PAGAMENTO, ID_BROKER_PSP, ID_PSP, TOTALE_FLUSSI, FLUSSI_ASSENTI, FLUSSI_PRESENTI, FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION, FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION, TOTALE_DIFF_AMOUNT
| join kind=leftouter has_diff_num on $left.ID_PSP == $right.PSP, $left.ID_BROKER_PSP == $right.INT_PSP
| extend TOTALE_DIFF_AMOUNT=case(isempty(TOTALE_DIFF_AMOUNT), 0, TOTALE_DIFF_AMOUNT)
| extend TOTALE_DIFF_NUM=case(isempty(TOTALE_DIFF_NUM), 0 , TOTALE_DIFF_NUM)
| extend FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION=case(isempty(FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION), 0, FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION)
| extend FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION=case(isempty(FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION), 0, FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION)
| extend GIORNATA_PAGAMENTO=todatetime(GIORNATA_PAGAMENTO)
| project GIORNATA_PAGAMENTO, ID_BROKER_PSP, ID_PSP, TOTALE_FLUSSI, FLUSSI_ASSENTI, FLUSSI_PRESENTI, FDR_IN_RITARDO_FIRST_VERSION, FDR_IN_RITARDO_LAST_VERSION, TOTALE_DIFF_AMOUNT, TOTALE_DIFF_NUM
